definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
when the moment comes/at that time
erhua variant of 小時候|小时候[xiao3 shi2 hou5]

sentences.english: Every time we sit together talking, Ququ is open to speak his mind.
sentences.chinese: 每次我們坐在一起聊天的時候，蛐蛐總是暢所欲言。

sentences.english: I got a splinter in my finger while I was moving the boxes.
sentences.chinese: 我在搬箱子的時候手指頭上紮了一根刺。

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱們一起去看電影吧，到時候我來叫你。

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 裏德說，有時候信息的缺乏會讓員工誤以爲老闆偏心。

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 當你是一個孩子的時候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: And when Owl hooted , Bluebird could not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 當貓頭鷹叫的時候，知更鳥睡不着。

sentences.english: When the chicken crow, follow the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 雞叫的時候，你就跟着雞走。

sentences.english: The big black Bakelite phone rang at half past ten.
sentences.chinese: 十點半的時候，外殼用膠木做的電話響了。

sentences.english: When you are in love, what in your eyes are all happy singles.
sentences.chinese: 當你戀愛的時候，你看到的都是快樂的單身族。

sentences.english: When I please my boss, I am ass-kissing.
sentences.chinese: 當我討上司歡心的時候，我是拍馬屁。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I'm a fish on the band .
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我也是一條岸上的小魚兒。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在喫魚的時候，纔可以用手去捏魚骨頭。

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和麪粉的時候會發生什麼事呢？

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在閱讀新聞的時候同時收聽潘朵拉網絡廣播。

sentences.english: In ancient times it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，送禮物時附上自己的名帖，是一種禮儀。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
